code: import React from'react';import{useLocalStorage}from'../../hooks/useLocalStorage';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DashboardOverview=()=>{const[classes]=useLocalStorage('classes',[]);const[students]=useLocalStorage('students',[]);const calculateStats=()=>({totalClasses:classes.length,subjectDistribution:students.reduce((acc,student)=>{acc[student.subject]=(acc[student.subject]||0)+1;return acc;},{})});const stats=calculateStats();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900",children:"\uC218\uC5C5 \uD604\uD669"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-800 mt-2",children:[stats.totalClasses,"\uAC1C"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900",children:"\uACFC\uBAA9\uBCC4 \uBD84\uD3EC"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-4 space-y-2",children:Object.entries(stats.subjectDistribution).map(_ref=>{let[subject,count]=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-gray-700",children:subject}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"font-semibold text-gray-800",children:[count,"\uBA85"]})]},subject);})})]})]});};export default DashboardOverview;
